/>
Introduction
This topic contains procedures for evaluating claims that are pending when a Veteran returns to active duty, including
effect of return to active duty on
Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) benefits
, and
a Veteran’s claim
suspending action on a claim due to return to active duty
exhibit of free text for decision notice for partial deferral of claims pending at return to active duty
method of requesting resumption of suspended claim
time limit for requesting resumption of suspended claim
resumption of suspended claims
, and
effect of delay in examining a Veteran due to return to active duty
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section A  - Evaluating a Pending Claim When a Veteran Returns to Active Duty
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section A
